CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK( Buyout_Amount__c), Buyout_Amount__c = 0 ) , IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png", "No:", 20, 20) + "No buyout included", IF( AND( Buyout_Authorized__c = TRUE, Buyout_Amount__c > 0 ), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png", "No:", 20, 20) + "Approved if within discount thresholds", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.png","Yes:",20,20)+ "Not authorized with annual or monthly payment terms") )
CustomField.label: Buyout/Subsidy Authorized?
